trackpad_settings.name: Trackpad Settings

trackpad_settings.notes:

- Applies system-wide trackpad preferences
- No additional software required

trackpad_settings.validate_script:
# Always return 1 (not configured) so configure script runs
exit 1
trackpad_settings.configure_script:
echo "Applying trackpad settings..."

# Enable tap to click
defaults write com.apple.driver.AppleBluetoothMultitouch.trackpad Clicking -bool true
defaults write com.apple.AppleMultitouchTrackpad Clicking -bool true
defaults -currentHost write NSGlobalDomain com.apple.mouse.tapBehavior -int 1
defaults write NSGlobalDomain com.apple.mouse.tapBehavior -int 1

# Enable three finger drag
defaults write com.apple.driver.AppleBluetoothMultitouch.trackpad TrackpadThreeFingerDrag -bool true
defaults write com.apple.AppleMultitouchTrackpad TrackpadThreeFingerDrag -bool true

# Set tracking speed (1 = slow, 3 = fast)
defaults write NSGlobalDomain com.apple.trackpad.scaling -float 2.0

echo "Trackpad settings applied. You may need to restart or log out/in for all changes to take effect."

esac

    else:

        relative_pattern = r'[\"\'](/[^\"\'>\s]*\.dmg[^\"\'>\s]*)[\"\'>\s]'
        relative_matches = re.findall(relative_pattern, response.text, re.IGNORECASE)
